A proclamation, for adjourning the Parliament, until the seventeenth day of Apryl 1682 Proclamations. 1682-01-31 Scotland. Privy Council.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : 1682.
Dated at end: Edinburgh, the last day of January, one thousand six hundred and eighty two, and of Our Reign the thirty four year. Arms 232; Steele notation: Britain, journment Our. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
=======
